Australia Post
Product or service enquiry
Reference number {!Case.CaseNumber}
Dear {!Case.PrimaryContactFirstName__c} {!Case.PrimaryContactLastName__c},
Final reminder, please let us know your tracking number.
We haven’t heard back yet with your tracking number or article number for the missing item enquiry we’ve received on your behalf.
Please reply to this email with your tracking number in the field below.
Article Number: .
This is a final reminder to let us know, so that we can assist you further. If we don’t receive a response within 3 days, your case will be closed.
If you need any clarification please don’t hesitate to let us know.
Thank you, Australia Post {!Case.Thread_Id}

Privacy Notice This privacy notice outlines in general terms how Australia Post handles your personal information in respect of the Snap It(‘the App’). Personal information is collected about you by Australia Post to fulfil services facilitated through the App. These services include the fulfilment of your enquiry or compliant, the identification and remediation of hazards or incidents related to the Australia Post network or operations and/or the fulfilment of a lead generation enquiry. Information obtained through the App may also be used to send you correspondence pertaining to your query/complaint, follow up lead generating enquiries (including providing commercial correspondence (unless you have unsubscribed to it) and to provide service support. If you provide the personal information of others to Australia Post it is your responsibility to advise those individuals that you have provided the information to Australia Post. If your personal information is not collected we may not be able communicate with you about your enquiry, services facilitated through this App or other Australia Post products or services you may be interested in. Your personal information may be disclosed to contracted service providers that assist in fulfilling the Program (such as information technology support and service support operations). Some of these providers are located in Japan and the United States. The Australia Post Group ‘Privacy Policy’ contains more information and also how you can seek access to, and correction of, your personal information held by Australia Post. It also explains how you can complain about a breach of your privacy and how your complaint will be dealt with.
